channel.itunes:author: Lincoln Loop

item.title: /dev/loop0
item.itunes:author: Lincoln Loop
item.itunes:summary: Today Brian Luft, Marco Louro, Pete Baumgartner, Brandon Konkle, and Yann Malet talk about configuration management and Salt, Selenium testing in Django 1.4, and the &yet Realtime Conference.
item.itunes:keywords: django, python, web development, realtime, salt, config management, configuration, chef, selenium, node.js, socket.io, sock.js, engine.io
